name: v1.2.1.Final
body:
- [**Bug**] Global rules don't work with ccompat API [#536](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/536)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**] Add UI support for labels meta-data [#530](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/530)
- [**Enhancement**] Add metadata labels support for all the storage variants [#529](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/529)
- [**Bug**] JPA storage does not persist same metadata as rest of storage varians [#516](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/516)
- [**Bug**] Fix UUIDs used as Avro schema names [#507](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/507)
- [**closed**] Confluent compatibility api - create, delete and create schema with same name fails [#505](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/505)
- [**Bug**] Fix a possible race condition in jpa storage search support [#498](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/498)
- [**Bug**] Connection to registry is "dying" after running bunch of tests [#475](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/475)
- [**EPIC**] Add IDs to UI html elements for testing purposes [#457](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/457)
- [**Task**][**UI**][**invalid**] Validate the Artifact ID [#455](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/455)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**] Improve presentation of artifacts with only an ID (no name) [#452](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/452)
- [**Bug**][**UI**] The "page selection" dropdown of the Paging control drops *up* [#447](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/447)
- [**Quality**] Improve handling of undetected artifact/schema types [#440](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/440)
- [**Enhancement**] Update ccompat layer to cover the latest version [#406](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/406)
- [**Discussion**] Consider checking in generated code [#379](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/379)
- [**Enhancement**] Set sensible defaults for Avro converter [#378](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/378)
- [**Quality**] Support of other schema types in CCompat API [#371](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/371)
- [**Enhancement**] Support artifact state in CCompat API [#370](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/370)
- [**Duplicate**][**Enhancement**][**Quality**] Cache or page possibly costly operations [#364](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/364)
- [**closed**] RegistryFacade - improve default detection of apicurio-registry-app-1.1.2-SNAPSHOT-runner.jar [#347](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/347)
- [**closed**] Add support for "deprecated" warnings in Serdes/Connect layer [#277](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/277)
- [**EPIC**] Maintenance: Maven build checkup [#226](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/226)
- [**closed**] Improve logging [#157](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/157)
